SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model.ManagerInterfaces

Interface IUserManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserManager
public interface IUserManager
Interface for user manager, defining CRUD methods and extra methods for searching users in the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    addUser(User user)
    CRUD method to add a new user to the database.
    void
    deleteUser(User user)
    CRUD method to delete a user from the database.
    List<User>
    getAllUsers()
    CRUD method to get all users that exist in the database.
    List<User>
    getUsersByIDs(List<Integer> iDs)
    Takes a list of IDs and finds every user in the database that has a corresponding ID in the inputted list.
    void
    updateUser(User user)
    CRUD method to update a user that exists in the database.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      int addUser(User user)
      CRUD method to add a new user to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to add.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added user.

    • updateUser

      void updateUser(User user)
      CRUD method to update a user that exists in the database. How the update happens is implementation specific.
      Parameters:
      user - The user with its values to update.

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(User user)
      CRUD method to delete a user from the database. Which values are used to find the user to delete is implementation specific.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to delete. Only needs the values that are needed to find the user.

    • getAllUsers

      List<User> getAllUsers()
      CRUD method to get all users that exist in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all users.

    • getUsersByIDs

      List<User> getUsersByIDs(List<Integer> iDs)
      Takes a list of IDs and finds every user in the database that has a corresponding ID in the inputted list.
      Parameters:
      iDs - A list of all IDs the caller wants the user for.
      Returns:
      A list of the found users.
